name: Stealth Blade
description:
Stealth Blade is a dark-style side-scrolling action game. The protagonist you play needs to pass numerous tests, avoid traps, and instantly kill the devil's minions to avenge his wife and save his son.

On the road to revenge, you need to continuously improve your skills, strengthen your attributes, and collect various props to help you kill enemies more efficiently.

Use your katana to instantly kill all enemies in front of you

Beware of deadly traps, any contact will result in instant death

Kill the flying dragon to get extra rewards

Strengthen yourself from multiple dimensions
